{{cpp/types/traits/is|1=is_enum
|description= 
Checks whether {{tt|T}} is an [[cpp/language/enum|enumeration type]]. Provides the member constant {{tt|value}} which is equal to {{c|true}}, if {{tt|T}} is an enumeration type. Otherwise, {{tt|value}} is equal to {{c|false}}.
|inherit_desc={{tt|T}} is an enumeration type
}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

struct A { enum E {}; };
static_assert(std::is_enum_v&lt;A&gt; == false);
static_assert(std::is_enum_v&lt;A::E&gt; == true);

enum E {};
static_assert(std::is_enum_v&lt;E&gt; == true);

enum class Ec : int {};
static_assert(std::is_enum_v&lt;Ec&gt; == true);

static_assert(std::is_enum_v&lt;int&gt; == false);

int main() {}
}}
